text: Jane Florence Benítez de León (born November 22, 1998) is a Filipino actress, singer, model, and dancer. She was one of the members of Girltrends, a female dance group of ABS-CBN's noontime variety show It's Showtime. ==Career== On July 17, 2019, de León was announced as the new actress who will star in the upcoming superhero film Darna as the comic book superheroine. Before de León, both Angel Locsin and Liza Soberano were respectively cast for the title role, but had to leave due to injuries they had acquired while preparing for the role. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size; 100% !Year!!Title!!Role!!Notes |- |2015 |Ex With Benefits |Arki's sister | |- | rowspan="2" |2017 |The Debutantes |Jenny | |- |Jose Bartolome: Guro | | |- |2018 |Walwal |Carla | |- |2019 |The Heiress |young Luna | |- |TBA |Darna |Darna / Narda | |- |} ===Television=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size; 100% !Year!!Title!!Role!!Network |- | rowspan="6" |2016||Wansapanataym||Sassy|| rowspan="17" |ABS-CBN |- |ASAP|| Herself/Performer |- | It's Showtime ||Herself/dancer-member |- | rowspan="5|Maalaala Mo Kaya || Apple |- | Sally |- |Vilma |- | rowspan="4" |2017 |Angelique |- |Doreen |- |Ipaglaban Mo! |Sharlene |- |Maalaala Mo Kaya |young Marlene |- |2017–2018 |La Luna Sangre |Lauren Catapang |- | rowspan="2" |2018 |Maalaala Mo Kaya |Cesar's Daughter |- |Ipaglaban Mo! |Kate Dollente |- |2018–2019 |Halik |Margarita "Maggie" Bartolome |- |2019 |Ipaglaban Mo! |Tere |- |2019–present |ASAP | Herself Performer |- |2020 |Maalaala Mo Kaya |Nesthy Petecio |- |2021 |Huwag Kang Mangamba |TBA |Kapamilya Channel |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:ABS-CBN personalities Category:Star Magic Category:Filipino film actresses Category:Filipino television actresses
